term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - regular single-strand polymer
term.title: regular single-strand polymer

item.text: A regular linear polymer that can be described by a preferred constitutional repeating unit in which both terminal constituent subunits are connected through single atoms to the other identical constitutional repeating units or to an end group.
